directions: Fill a shaker with ice; add ginger liqueur and Scotch. Cover shaker and shake; pour into a tumbler and top with ginger beer.
ingredients: 1/2 cup ice cubes, or as needed
1 1/2 fluid ounces ginger liqueur (such as Domaine de Canton®)
1 1/2 fluid ounces Scotch whiskey (such as Chivas Regal®)
1 (12 ounce) bottle ginger beer, or as needed
title: DSF's Smoke and Ginger
